import { Button, Paper, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, Tooltip } from "@material-ui/core" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { IoMdRefresh } from "react-icons/io" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { fetchGoal } from "../../../store/actions/courseGoal.action" import { EmptyRow, ErrorRow, LoadingRows } from "../SituationRow" const Row = ({ row }) => ( {row.muctieu} {row.mota} {row.cdr_ctdt} ) const CreateForm = () => ({ }) const CourseGoal = ({ mamh }) => { const [create, setCreate] = useState(false) const goals = useSelector(state => state.course[mamh].goal) const dispatch = useDispatch() const fetch = () => { dispatch(fetchGoal(mamh)) } useEffect(() => { if (!goals.data) dispatch(fetchGoal(mamh)) }, [dispatch, mamh, goals.data]) return
{create && } Mục tiêu Mô tả Chuẩn đầu ra CTĐT { goals.loading ? : goals.error ? : goals.data && goals.data.length !== 0 ? goals.data.map(row => ( )) : Vui lòng  tạo mới! )} /> }
} export default CourseGoal
